description: This file contains test cases for the VueTemplate class, focusing on project initialization, configuration, post-processing, and variable substitution within a Vue.js project setup. It uses pytest fixtures and tests to verify functionality related to project templates.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs and cleans it up after the test.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration files and sample template files for testing.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a mock project configuration object for testing purposes.

methods.name: test_vue_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the template's initial information can be retrieved correctly.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the process of initializing a Vue project from the template, including directory structure and content replacement.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that a post-processing script is correctly executed and completes successfully.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests loading a project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures that template variables within files are properly replaced with project-specific values during initialization.
